comment:
* A filter for abstract pathnames. * *

Instances of this interface may be passed to the {@link * File#listFiles(java.io.FileFilter) listFiles(FileFilter)} method * of the {@link java.io.File} class. * * @since 1.2

methods.name: boolean accept(File pathname)
methods.comment: * Tests whether or not the specified abstract pathname should be * included in a pathname list. * * @param pathname The abstract pathname to be tested * @return true if and only if pathname * should be included
